name: shrimpbot
description: A discord bot I made to be used in the discord server I'm primarly present in. Currently it can play music, greet new members, flip a coin, quote the different ways you can cook shrimp from Forest Gump, keeps track of the number of times Shrimp has been said, roll dice, give a random quote said by a memeber in the server, and keeps track of the number of times lah700 has said smh. Hosted on SparkedHost.
